name: FAQ-0009
question: WHY DO I HAVE TO REGISTER BEFORE I CAN REFER MYSELF TO A VOLUNTEER OPPORTUNITY?

answer:
As part of our ongoing commitment to quality service, and in an effort to improve the MyKartavya experience for both volunteers and nonprofits, we ask volunteers to register with us in order to express interest in a volunteer opportunity.

This helps ensure that accurate and reliable information is exchanged between volunteers and nonprofits, preserves the integrity and functionality of the MyKartavya service, and results in stronger volunteer connections.

Volunteer registration allows us to verify the validity of a volunteer's email address and phone number ensuring that nonprofits can successfully follow-up with the volunteers. Registration also offers volunteers access to a number of excellent tools and resources available on MyKartavya, all designed to save time and improve functionality and provide you with the best of the opportunities. 

As always, the privacy and safeguarding of your personal information is of primary concern to us. Your registration information will never be shared, and will only be used to communicate with you and the nonprofit organizations of your choosing.
